Jobs.title: Vice President Sales & Operations
Jobs.description: ', 'Innovatech provides software & consultancy to banking, telco and large manufacturing/service industries. We increase the Business Efficiency of our clients by integrating systems, processes, data and information. We provide solutions for Integrated Document Management & Archiving, Business Process Improvement/Automation Solutions, Mobile Platforms and Business Intelligence Solutions"', '', '* Responsible from sales, marketing, partner development/management and operations', '* Innovatech focuses on End to End Solutions for Banking and Insurance, Service Oriented Architecture ( SOA ), Business Process Management ( BPM ), Enterprise Content Management, Next Generation Business Intelligence, Mobile Applications', '* Our Partners : ', '* Adobe - Customer Experience Management, Personalized Output Management, Web Intelligence', '* Oracle - Data Integration, Service Oriented Architecture, Business Process Management, Business Intelligence', '* Kony Software - Cross Platform Mobile Application Development & Vertical Mobile Applications ( Banking, Insurance, Retail, Media, Airlines, Hospitality, CRM, etc. )', '* Antenna Software - Device Independent Mobile Application Development Platform', '* Newgen - Integrated Business Process Management & Document Management, Archival', '* Ultimus - Business Process Management', '* SOA Software - SOA Governance', '* Panorama Software - Next Generation Business Intelligence', '

Jobs.title: Sales & Marketing Coordinator
Jobs.description: ', '•Reporting to GM', '•Vendors : Adobe, Autodesk, IBM, SAP, Blackboard, Babylon, Norton', '•Responsibilities Include :', '•P&L Responsibility for ~45 Mil US$ Annual Sales target', '•Managing a team of 25 sales, sales support, marketing and product management personnel', '•Responsible from all sales channels including dealer and wholesale channels, VAR/solution sales, retail and government sales', '•Responsible from all marcom activities and vendor relations for about 12 different software vendors and the New Horizons brand', '

Jobs.title: Group Manager - Image & Knowledge Management Products
Jobs.description: ', '•Siemens Healthcare is a global supplier of in-vivo ( Imaging Diagnostics), in-vitro ( Laboratory Diagnostics ) and Healthcare-IT ( HIS, Radiology/Cardiology IT ) solutions to the healthcare market', '•Responsible from Business and Group Management for the PACS/RIS ( Picture Archiving & Communication / Radiology Information System ) product lines', '

Jobs.title: IS/IT Manager
Jobs.description: ', 'Responsible from IS/IT Management reporting to GM', '•Increased Internal Customer Satisfaction of IT Department by 8% consecutively for 3 years', '•Leaded the merger of IS systems, processes and organization of Otoyol Sanayi ( Industrial entity ) and former Otoyol Pazarlama ( Commercial entity). Merger was successful without any major disruption', '•Leaded the BPR – Business Process Re-engineering effort prior to SAP implementation and re-structuring of the company as the BPR Project Manager. BPR initiative finished on time+budget', '•Leaded the CRM initiative focusing on outbound call centre and campaign management. Project finished on time, under budget.', '•Integrated the Baan ERP backbone with the TNT system to achieve integration for the Spare Parts Warehouse & Distribution Outsourcing ', '', 'Responsibilities :', '•Managed a team of 20 people', '•Development & Execution of IS/IT strategies according to the business priorities and vision of Otoyol', '•Leaded the IS/Process integration of Otoyol with IVECO global operations', '•Leaded the SAP ERP & PLM ( Product Lifecycle Management ) implementation initiatives', '•Planning, Budgeting, Development/Vendor Selection, Execution and Support/Outsourcing of several IT / software projects', '•BaaN ERP – Implementation & Application Management', '

Jobs.company: Promis Information Systems ( Later : Adato Consulting )
Jobs.title: VP Operations / Co-Managing Partner
Jobs.description: ', '* Selling and Delivering Complex CRM, MIS, BI Projects', '* IS Consultancy', '* Software Development', '

summary: ', "Haluk Çavuşoğlu's Sole Mission : Sales Excellence - By helping his clients being successful in their businesses.", '', 'Expert Sales Coach - Coaching & Leading Marketing and Sales teams in "Knocking the Door” To “Closing The Deal” with new Prospects ', '', 'Expertise : Complex Solution Sales, Sales/Business Development, Partner Management/Development, General Management, Business/Management Consulting, Program & Project Management, IS/IT Management, Business/IS Integration/Alignment', '', 'Domain Experience in : Mobile Application Development Platforms, BPM/Business Process Management, SOA/Service Oriented Architecture, ERP, SCM/SRM, Operational & Analytical CRM, EIS/Management & Operational Reporting, Business Intelligence, Rich Internet Applications, ', '', 'Industry Experience in : Banking & Financial Services, Telco, Automotive, Retail, E-Commerce, Logistics', '
